content.raw:
I’ve updated all of my models but I’m still seeing this in parts of the practice tunnel. It seems much less frequent in general, but there are certain areas where it is still very common \(perhaps a few sections got missed in the fix?\). This particular one can be found taking the first left, then is just above the fire extinguisher at the next intersection. There are several others nearby that I’ve highlighted in red in the 2nd image.

‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2213443546-image.png)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1208585785-image.png)
